      • whatMat

        public int whatMat(boolean potions,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        The player chooses here what item he want's to buy.
        Parameters:
        potions - Checks if the buyable item is a potion or not.
        list - The list with all the items buyalbe from the merchant
        Returns:
        returns the picked item.

      • transaction

        public int transaction(Player player,
                       int price,
                       java.lang.String itemName,
                       int amount,
                       int sellerMoney)
        Here is where the transaction happens.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is buying and equiping it.
        price - the price that the player has to pay.
        itemName - the itemname that is going to be bought.
        amount - the amount that the player is buying.
        sellerMoney - the amount of money the seller has.
        Returns:
        returns the quantity that was bought.
